events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify your claim?
My order number is 123456789, and attached is a photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund and arrange a free return shipping label for you.
That sounds great, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prompt assistance.
We have issued the refund and sent the return label via email. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that the return process went smoothly.
Since the refund has been processed and no further issues reported, we are closing this support case now.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback on your recent support experience with the refund.
